text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Andorra la Vella | official_name = | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Parish | image_skyline = Andorra la Vella 3.JPG | image_alt = View of Andorra la Vella and Escaldes-Engordany | image_caption = View of Andorra la Vella and a small part of Escaldes-Engordany | image_flag = Flag of Andorra la Vella.svg | image_shield = Emblem of Andorra la Vella.svg | shield_size = 70px | image_seal = | nickname = Queen Bee Angela | image_map = Andorra la Vella in Andorra.svg | mapsize = 270px | map_alt = Andorra la Vella in Andorra | map_caption = Andorra la Vella parish, in red, in Andorra | pushpin_map = | pushpin_map_narrow = yes | pushpin_mapsize = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_caption = |coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Andorra | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | parts_type = Villages | parts_style = para | parts = | p1 = Santa Coloma d'Andorra | p2 = | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Andorra la Vella | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_party = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Conxita Marsol Riart | unit_pref = Métrico | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 12 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 1023 |elevation_max_m = |elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 22886 | population_as_of = 2015 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = Andorran andorrà, andorrana (ca) | population_blank1_title = | population_blank1 = | demographics_type1 = | demographics1_footnotes = | demographics1_title1 = | demographics1_info1 = | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = AD500 | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = AD-05 | website = Official website | footnotes = }} Andorra la Vella is the capital city of the principality of Andorra and is one of the seven parishes of Andorra. It is in the southwestern part of the country. ==Geography== The Andorra la Vella parish is in the southwestern part of the country at the confluence of two mountain streams, the Valira del Nord (Northern Valira) and the Valira de l'Orient (Eastern Valira), which join to form the Gran Valira that flows through the capital city. The parish borders with the La Massana parish to the north, with the Escaldes-Engordany parish to the east, with the Sant Julià de Lòria parish to the south and with Spain to the west. The highest mountain in the parish is Pic d'Os () with an elevation of above sea level; it is on the border with the Sant Julià de Lòria parish and Spain. At 1023 m (3,356 ft) above sea level, it is the highest capital in Europe. ==Population== The parish had a population, in 2015, of 22,886 inhabitants, for a population density of persons/km². The city is also the centre for many banks and businesses. The state is not a member of the European Union, but has a customs arrangement with the EU, and uses the euro. ==References== Category:National capitals in Europe Category:Parishes of Andorra
